statements: SELECT * FROM location_quests;
SELECT quest_name, quest_description FROM location_quests WHERE reward_type = 'XP';
SELECT quest_name, level_required FROM location_quests ORDER BY level_required DESC;
SELECT quest_name, reward_type, reward_amount FROM location_quests WHERE reward_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM location_quests WHERE level_required BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM location_quests WHERE level_required > 10 ORDER BY quest_name DESC;
SELECT quest_name, quest_description FROM location_quests WHERE reward_type = 'Gold' AND reward_amount >= 100;
SELECT quest_id, quest_name, location_id FROM location_quests WHERE location_id = 5 AND level_required < 15;
SELECT quest_name, reward_type, reward_amount FROM location_quests WHERE level_required BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY reward_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM location_quests WHERE quest_name LIKE '%Dragon%' ORDER BY quest_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM quests LIMIT 5
SELECT quest_id, quest_name FROM quests WHERE quest_id = 1
SELECT quest_name, quest_description FROM quests WHERE location = 'Forest'
SELECT quest_id, quest_name, quest_description FROM quests WHERE quest_name LIKE '%treasure%'
SELECT * FROM missions ORDER BY required_level DESC
SELECT * FROM quests WHERE quest_id = 1;
SELECT quest_name, quest_description FROM quests WHERE location = 'Forest';
SELECT quest_id, quest_name, quest_description FROM quests ORDER BY quest_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM missions WHERE required_level > 5 AND location != 'Desert';
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, location FROM missions WHERE required_level BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY mission_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players;
SELECT quest_name, quest_description FROM quests;
SELECT mission_name, mission_location FROM missions;
SELECT * FROM quests WHERE quest_location='Forest';
SELECT * FROM quests WHERE quest_name = 'The Lost Island';
SELECT quest_name, quest_location FROM quests WHERE quest_location = 'Forest';
SELECT quest_name, quest_description FROM quests ORDER BY quest_name DESC;
SELECT mission_name, mission_location FROM missions WHERE quest_id = '4d91c49e-742e-4f48-8366-fc0cd5bf37b0';
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players ORDER BY player_level DESC, player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM quests;
SELECT quest_name, quest_description FROM quests ORDER BY quest_name DESC;
SELECT quest_name, required_level FROM quests WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT mission_name, mission_description FROM missions WHERE quest_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE region = 'Forest' AND climate = 'Temperate';
SELECT quest_name, required_level FROM quests;
SELECT mission_name, mission_description FROM missions WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE region = 'Desert' ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 10 ORDER BY player_level ASC;
SELECT quest_name, quest_description, player_name, player_level FROM quests JOIN players ON quests.location_id = players.location_id;
SELECT * FROM quests;
SELECT title, description, level FROM quests WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, level, last_login FROM players WHERE player_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT mission_id, title, description, reward, quest_id FROM missions ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT location_id, location_name, area, region FROM locations WHERE region = 'Europe';
SELECT * FROM quests;
SELECT title, level FROM quests WHERE level > 5;
SELECT player_name, level, last_login FROM players WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT quest_id, title, location_id FROM quests JOIN missions ON quests.quest_id = missions.quest_id;
SELECT player_name, mission_id, status FROM players JOIN player_missions ON players.player_id = player_missions.player_id;
